title: Anti-Hero
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:05.68] I have this thing where I get older, but just never wiser
[00:10.35] Midnights become my afternoons
[00:15.14] When my depression works the graveyard shift
[00:18.30] All of the people I've ghosted stand there in the room
[00:24.69] I should not be left to my own devices
[00:28.02] They come with prices and vices
[00:30.68] I end up in crises
[00:32.45] Tale as old as time
[00:35.02] I wake up screaming from dreaming
[00:37.62] One day I'll watch as you're leaving
[00:40.02] 'Cause you got tired of my scheming
[00:42.49] For the last time
[00:44.37] It's me
[00:45.85] Hi!
[00:47.14] I'm the problem, it's me
[00:49.31] At teatime
[00:51.95] Everybody agrees
[00:54.90] I'll stare directly at the sun, but never in the mirror
[00:59.48] It must be exhausting always rooting for the anti-hero
[01:05.26] 
[01:09.76] Sometimes I feel like everybody is a sexy baby
[01:14.78] And I'm a monster on the hill
[01:19.64] Too big to hang out
[01:21.09] Slowly lurching toward your favorite city
[01:24.62] Pierced through the heart but never killed
[01:29.45] Did you hear my covert narcissism
[01:32.26] I disguise as altruism?
[01:35.11] Like some kind of congressman
[01:36.75] Tale as old as time
[01:39.45] I wake up screaming from dreaming
[01:41.83] One day, I'll watch as you're leaving
[01:44.58] And life will lose all its meaning
[01:46.94] For the last time
[01:48.89] It's me
[01:50.32] Hi!
[01:51.54] I'm the problem, it's me (I'm the problem, it's me)
[01:53.68] At teatime
[01:56.55] Everybody agrees
[01:59.23] I'll stare directly at the sun, but never in the mirror
[02:03.63] It must be exhausting always rooting for the anti-hero
[02:09.89] 
[02:13.98] I have this dream my daughter-in-law kills me for the money
[02:18.95] She thinks I left them in the will
[02:24.05] The family gathers 'round and reads it
[02:26.77] And then someone screams out
[02:29.02] "She's laughing up at us from hell!"
[02:33.41] It's me
[02:34.81] Hi!
[02:35.85] I'm the problem, it's me
[02:38.26] It's me
[02:39.72] Hi!
[02:41.83] I'm the problem, it's me
[02:43.53] It's me
[02:44.71] Hi!
[02:46.87] Everybody agrees
[02:48.22] Everybody agrees
[02:51.03] 
[02:53.13] It's me
[02:54.63] Hi! (Hi!)
[02:55.98] I'm the problem, it's me (I'm the problem, it's me)
[02:58.05] At teatime
[03:00.69] Everybody agrees (everybody agrees)
[03:03.54] I'll stare directly at the sun, but never in the mirror
[03:08.09] It must be exhausting always rooting for the anti-hero
[03:12.27]
